Line 127: Line 127:
According to the Forbes 400 list (2005), the combined net worth of [http://www.forbes.com/lists/2005/54/XFXI.html Larry Page] and [http://www.forbes.com/lists/2005/54/D664.html Sergey Brin] is $22 billion US.
According to the Forbes 400 list (2005), the combined net worth of [http://www.forbes.com/lists/2005/54/XFXI.html Larry Page] and [http://www.forbes.com/lists/2005/54/D664.html Sergey Brin] is $22 billion US.
â
But due to the recent surge in stock price (April 2005-June 2005), their net worth is significantly higher, nearly triple. When recorded on the Forbes 400 the stock was around a level of $111. Its most recent close was $296. That is an approximate wealth of $10.91 billion in stock. This is not 100% accurate as both Page and Brin sold an enormous amount of stock before the 50% surge from the $200 mark. The combined sale of their stock on the open market was reportedly $2 billion total.
+
But due to the recent surge in stock price (April 2005-June 2005), their net worth is significantly higher, nearly triple. When recorded on the Forbes 400 the stock was around a level of $111. Its most recent close was $355. That is an approximate wealth of $99.25 billion in stock. This is not 100% accurate as both Page and Brin sold an enormous amount of stock before the 50% surge from the $200 mark. The combined sale of their stock on the open market was reportedly $2 billion total.
